member.name: M:TencentCloud.Tts.V20190823.TtsClient.TextToVoice(TencentCloud.Tts.V20190823.Models.TextToVoiceRequest)
member.summary: This API is used to convert any text to speech, allowing your devices and applications to talk to users. ​Tencent Cloud Text To Speech (TTS) can synthesize speech from text in real time for many use cases, such as audiobook and news apps, voice reminders on smart devices, quick synthesis of a celebrity's voice based on existing programs or certain voice records available on the Internet, and personalized vehicle navigation systems. It is free for use in beta. It supports SSML. For syntax details, see [SSML](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/1073/49575?from_cn_redirect=1).

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Tts.V20190823.TtsClient.TextToVoiceSync(TencentCloud.Tts.V20190823.Models.TextToVoiceRequest)
member.summary: This API is used to convert any text to speech, allowing your devices and applications to talk to users. ​Tencent Cloud Text To Speech (TTS) can synthesize speech from text in real time for many use cases, such as audiobook and news apps, voice reminders on smart devices, quick synthesis of a celebrity's voice based on existing programs or certain voice records available on the Internet, and personalized vehicle navigation systems. It is free for use in beta. It supports SSML. For syntax details, see [SSML](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/1073/49575?from_cn_redirect=1).

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tts.V20190823.Models.Subtitle.Text
member.summary: The word in the text that is sent.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tts.V20190823.Models.Subtitle.BeginTime
member.summary: The start timestamp of the word in the synthesized audio data, in milliseconds.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tts.V20190823.Models.Subtitle.EndTime
member.summary: The end timestamp of the word in the synthesized audio data, in milliseconds.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tts.V20190823.Models.Subtitle.BeginIndex
member.summary: The start index of the character in the whole sentence, starting from 0.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tts.V20190823.Models.Subtitle.EndIndex
member.summary: The end index of the character in the whole sentence, starting from 0.

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Tts.V20190823.Models.Subtitle.ToMap(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String},System.String)
member.summary: For internal usage only. DO NOT USE IT.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tts.V20190823.Models.TextToVoiceRequest.Text
member.summary: The source text for synthesizing speech, which is encoded in UTF-8. It can contain up to 150 Chinese characters (a full-width punctuation as a Chinese character) or 500 letters ( a half-width punctuation as a letter).

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tts.V20190823.Models.TextToVoiceRequest.SessionId
member.summary: The `SessionId` of a request, which will be returned as-is. We recommend that you pass characters like uuid to prevent repetition.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tts.V20190823.Models.TextToVoiceRequest.Volume
member.summary: Volume range: [0, 10], corresponding to 11 volume levels. 0 is the default value, indicating the normal volume. There is no mute option.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tts.V20190823.Models.TextToVoiceRequest.ProjectId
member.summary: Project ID, which defaults to 0 and can be customized.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tts.V20190823.Models.TextToVoiceRequest.ModelType
member.summary: Model type, with `1` for the default model.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tts.V20190823.Models.TextToVoiceRequest.PrimaryLanguage
member.summary:
Primary language type:
1 - Chinese (default)
2 - English

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tts.V20190823.Models.TextToVoiceRequest.SampleRate
member.summary:
Audio sample rate:
16000: 16k (default)
8000: 8k

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tts.V20190823.Models.TextToVoiceRequest.Codec
member.summary: Format of returned audio. Valid values: WAV (default), MP3, and PCM.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tts.V20190823.Models.TextToVoiceRequest.EnableSubtitle
member.summary: Whether to enable the timestamp feature. Default value: `false`.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tts.V20190823.Models.TextToVoiceRequest.SegmentRate
member.summary: Segmentation rate. Valid range: [0,1,2]; default value: `0`. The higher the value, the lower the rate, and the easier the segmentation. It is recommended not to change this parameter to ensure better synthesis quality.

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Tts.V20190823.Models.TextToVoiceRequest.ToMap(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String},System.String)
member.summary: For internal usage only. DO NOT USE IT.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tts.V20190823.Models.TextToVoiceResponse.Audio
member.summary: Base64-encoded WAV/MP3 audio data

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tts.V20190823.Models.TextToVoiceResponse.SessionId
member.summary: The `SessionId` of a request

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tts.V20190823.Models.TextToVoiceResponse.Subtitles
member.summary: Timestamp information. If the timestamp feature is not enabled, an empty array will be returned.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tts.V20190823.Models.TextToVoiceResponse.RequestId
member.summary: The unique request ID, which is returned for each request. RequestId is required for locating a problem.

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Tts.V20190823.Models.TextToVoiceResponse.ToMap(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String},System.String)
member.summary: For internal usage only. DO NOT USE IT.
